1. Splendid - Church
2. Best-ever - Synagogue
3. Superior - Church
4. Exemplary - Synagogue
5. Dreadful - Detestable (I cannot bring myself to associate such a negative adjective with any place of worship)
6. Detestable - Vile (Again, I cannot bring myself to use such language to describe any place of worship)
7. Vile - Atrocious (Church)
8. Atrocious - Synagogue (I cannot in good conscience associate such a negative adjective with any place of worship)

I do hope this meets with your approval, my dearest wife.
